locations.name: Auckland
locations.description: New Zealand's largest city, known as the 'City of Sails', featuring vibrant waterfronts, world-class dining, and gateway to nearby islands.

locations.name: Bay of Islands
locations.description: A subtropical paradise known for its beautiful islands, turquoise waters, marine life encounters, and significant historical sites.

locations.name: Queenstown
locations.description: Set against the dramatic Southern Alps and Lake Wakatipu, known as the 'Adventure Capital' offering stunning scenery, outdoor activities, and fine dining. Likely base for the Milford Sound excursion.
